page.title: 05DANCING
page.content: I GO TO BALLET,TAP,MODERN DANCING. I GO ON A SATURDAY.ALL THE GIRLS WEAR A ROYAL BLUE LEOTARD AND A PINK HEAD BAND,A PAIR OF PINK BALLET SHOES, A PAIR OF WHITE TAP SHOES,A PAIR OF WHITE PLIMPSOLES.I HAVE FOUR MEDALS AND FOUR CERTIFICATES.HONOURS IS THE TOP MARK,THEN HIGHLY COMMENDED,THEN COMMENDED,PASS PLUSS, THEN PASS, THEN FAIL.I HAVE GOT HONOURS BEFORE, HIGHLY COMMENDED TWICE AND COMMENEDED ONCE. I GO TO BALLET NEAR BEDFONT LIBRARY.I AM IN GRADE ONE AND THE EXAMS ARE HELD AT ST MARYS CHURCH HALL.THERE ARE ABOUT EIGHTEEN GIRLS IN MY CLASS AND MISS WENDY IS THE NAME OF OUR TEACHER. THIS SATURDAY I AM TAKING MORE EXAMS. ONE BALLET DANCE, TWO MODERN DANCES, THREE TAP DANCES. THE LADY THAT LIVED IN THE HALL DIED.INSIDE THE HALL THE FLOOR IS MADE OF WOOD AND HAS SPLINTERS STICKING OUT OF IT.
